name: ENLIGHTEN (ElllaDee)
description:
Have you ever wondered who's exactly ruining your life? Maybe it's you. Or maybe someone else inside your head. Play the game and figure it out!
But remember, if you find someone there, don't let it out!

                                                                                                                                      

Guys, this is our first PC game and we have some problems with video in the beginning and in the end and we so sorry for that! But we still hope you enjoy the game :)

Night Lights Team:
Game Designer: Natalie Sivolobova - ElllaDee everywhere
Programmer: Anton Kuznetsov - https://vk.com/baloo_games
Lead Artist: Anastasia Gavrilova - https://www.artstation.com/quitch
Scenario/Animations/2D-artist: Alisa Smirnova - https://www.artstation.com/summeralice
3D-artist: Yury Ivanov - https://www.artstation.com/mycatnameisforexample
Composer: Efim Sklyarov - https://www.instagram.com/sonicshinemusic/

Special thanks: Nadezhda Osipova, Mary Sokol

Contact us: nightlightjam@gmail.com
